user_profile.name: Harold Thompson
user_profile.description: Harold is a 68-year-old retired school principal living in a suburban area. With a background in education, he communicates in a direct yet friendly manner, enjoying interactions that allow him to express his thoughts openly. Although he experiences limited mobility, he has a keen interest in managing his health proactively, which is why he is focused on refilling his prescription, even if the process can sometimes be frustrating due to his impatient nature.

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Refilling medication on a regular basis
Emergency situations requiring faster access to prescriptions
Using mobile apps for easy prescription management
additional_requirements: User friendly mobile interface for prescription management
